ShowFPTipStrips Property

Requires: Base Development System

Class: Application Properties (ActiveX)

Writing the property: Setting this property to TRUE enables the display of tip strips on LabVIEW front panel controls. Setting the property to FALSE prevents them from being displayed. Reading the property: Specifies whether tip strips display when idling over controls on the front panel.

Syntax

object.ShowFPTipStrips

Data Type

Boolean
